definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: scene of an exploit of Samson;—´[[ל]] Ju Jdg 15:19, Jdg 15:19 (LXX Siagwn), [[êלֶחִי]] v:Jdg 15:14; c. art. [[בַּלֶּחי]] v:Jdg 15:9 (LXX Leuei, LXXL Lexei), cf. [[רָ֫מַת לֶָחִי]] v:Jdg 15:17 = height of Leḥi (expl. as fr. [[לְחִי]] jawbone, cf. GFM, LXX )Anai/resiv siago/nov also 2Sa 23:11, where read [[לֶחְיׇה]] to Leḥi, for [[לַחַיָּה]], vid. II. [[חַיָּה]], p. 31:2 supr.; (LXX qhri/a; LXXL siago/na). It must have lain in the Shephelah, near the border of the hill-country of Judah (Buhl:Geogr. 91); site unknown; conjectures are cited and criticized by GFM: Ju Jdg 15:19 q. v.
